question.title: How to see Full Build output of a java/mvn project in IntelliJ
question.body:
I am a using intelliJ IDE community edition for a Java project with mvn.pom. I build the project using Ctrl+F9 key. The Build tab in intelliJ only shows a very short/summarized output.

I want to see details of actual build process for example what arguments are being passed to javac etc as a result of the build etc. Any help would be appreciated. thanks
